data.message: I need your email adress urgently, will gladly reported to you email in Germany and EU Discuss on South - Africa, is on the verge of a civil war - Julius Malema ANC Youth Leader is becoming very Hostile about Foreign Companies - He is busy to Mobilizing Mine workers to Sabotage Foreign Companies and he is busy with his Land Grabb.All EU / Foreign Countries' businesses should be against Nationalisation, be warned to Immediately withdraw Money from South Africa ......
